name: YOU DON'T KNOW JACK SPORTS
description: Sports nuts, this one’s for you. The classic YDKJ Sports pack is back, featuring sporty host Guy Towers! Think you know everything about football, basketball, baseball, or hockey? How about tennis, volleyball, golf, or lawn darts? Then light up the scoreboard with YOU DON’T KNOW JACK Sports – it’s YDKJ all hopped up on 'roids!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 Processor: 500 MHz processor or faster Memory: 128 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 530 MB available space Sound Card: 16-bit sound card Additional Notes: The game runs at 640x480 max resolution.  Manually adjust your Desktop resolution if you want the game to fill the screen.

reviews.review_text: I know next to nothing about sports, and knew that going in when I got the Classic Pack that contained this game. Yet, I did manage to get some right that I accumulated random knowledge about over the years, and learned some new interesting trivia as well. Regardless, this game is fun even if you lose badly. The question categories are fun to try to guess at the type of question you will be given if you choose them, and the questions are fairly broad in their range. I imagine that playing it in multiplayer with a group that has a decent knowledge of sports trivia would be rather interesting, but at least for this game I don't have anyone to play such an arrangement with. As a single player game it still remains quite entertaining though.
ahh the good ole days of YDKJ!! i feel like im 19 again!
